title: LYNO AI Early Bird Presale Continues as Token Price Prepares to Rise
description: LYNO AI Early Bird Presale Continues as Token Price Prepares to Rise
content:
ROAD TOWN, British Virgin Islands, Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LYNO AI is attracting serious investor attention since its early bird presale progress is gaining momentum. With over 265,000 tokens already sold in the total allocation of 16 million tokens, the sale is already proving to be very strong in demand in the market. Investors are rushing to buy their tokens as the presale price is at the moment only 0.050 dollars per token and this phase is about to end.

Token price will rise on the next presale to 0.055, and this helps build a sense of urgency and encourage buyers to act now. Such price change indicates the development trend of LYNO AI and the rising level of value expectation of the project. The current stage is a strategic purchasing during which the early entrants have the advantage of a low entry price that will subsequently increase at the planned time.

To make this even more appealing, LYNO AI is organizing a giveaway, which is available only to those who purchase their tokens during the presale, and where they have a chance to win 100K. This initiative is another extra incentive and shows that LYNO AI will not leave the first supporters unrewarded. These promotions increase the value proposition of the whole package in a presale program.

Investors should take advantage of the early bird presale of LYNO AI before the end of the presale. Already having sold over 250,000 tokens prematurely, this momentum is expected to be a possible explosion as the presale reaches its end. Individuals who would like to use the current price and the giveaway opportunity must hurry in order to take advantage before it is too late.

The LYNO AI presale is audited by Cyberscope, which guarantees the transparency and trustworthiness of its activities. This enhances the investors in this stage with additional confidence.

In conclusion, LYNO AI is an appealing presale that is attracting a lot of investor attention, there is an imminent increase in the price of the token, and this presale offers excellent incentives. Now is the moment to act quickly and place your order for tokens before the price increases as anticipated.

For more information about LYNO visit the links below:

However, due to the inherently speculative nature of the blockchain sector—including cryptocurrency, NFTs, and mining—complete accuracy cannot always be guaranteed.Neither the media platform nor the publisher shall be held responsible for any fraudulent activities, misrepresentations, or financial losses arising from the content of this press release. Any concerns, complaints, or copyright issues related to this article should be directed to the content provider mentioned above.

Photos accompanying this announcement are available at:
summary: LYNO AI's early bird presale progress is gaining momentum, with over 265,000 tokens already sold and a total allocation of 16 million tokens allocated. Investors are eager to buy tokens as the presale price is only 0.050 dollars per token and this phase is about to end. The token price will rise on the next presale to 0.055, indicating a rising level of value expectation for the project. LYNOAI is also offering a giveaway, available only to those who purchase tokens during the presales, and offering a chance to win 100K. The presale is audited by Cyberscope, which guarantees the transparency and trustworthiness of its activities. Investors should take advantage of this presale before the price increases as anticipated.
shortSummary: LYNO AI's early bird presale is gaining momentum, with investors rushing to buy tokens amid rising investor expectations of value increases.

scraped_sources.text:
AI-Powered Cross-Chain Arbitrage Engine
Unlock profitable opportunities across blockchain networks with AI-driven precision and zero manual intervention
About Us
Lyno revolutionises the traditional arbitrage opportunities are dominated by institutional players with million-dollar infrastructure investments. LYNO levels the playing field by providing retail investors access to sophisticated trading algorithms and cross-chain capabilities.
Secure
Multi-layered protection
Lightning Speed execution
Real-time execution
Community Driven
Governance through $LYNO token
AI-Powered
Smart algorithms
Key Features
AI-Driven Intelligence
Smart. Fast. Autonomous. Our machine learning algorithms continuously scan markets across multiple blockchains, detecting price discrepancies within milliseconds. Execute profitable trades automatically with advanced risk management and gas optimization—no manual monitoring required.
True Cross-Chain Dominance
Break Down Network Barriers. Access previously isolated arbitrage opportunities across Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Arbitrum, and 12+ other networks. Our unified infrastructure bridges fragmented liquidity pools, unlocking profit potential worth millions in missed opportunities.
Community-Governed Protocol
Your Platform, Your Rules. Shape the future of decentralized arbitrage through transparent governance. $LYNO token holders vote on protocol upgrades, fee structures, and network integrations. Earn staking rewards while participating in platform decisions.
How It Works
Our cross-chain arbitrage platform works through these key layers
Market Intelligence
Real-Time Market Surveillance
Multi-Chain Price Feeds
Monitor token prices and liquidity across 15+ networks simultaneously.
Oracle Integration
Leverage Chainlink and other trusted oracles for accurate, manipulation-resistant data.
Gas Price Analytics
Optimize transaction timing by tracking network congestion and fee structures.
Swipe to see more
Tokenomics
The $LYNO token powers our ecosystem and provides value to all participants
Token Utility
$LYNO token provides multiple utilities within the Lyno ecosystem, including fee sharing, AI agent access, and liquidity mining rewards.
Arbitrage Fee Sharing
- Revenue Distribution: 30% of protocol fees are distributed to $LYNO stakers with different tiers and weightage.
- Buy & Burn: 30% of protocol fees are used to market buy and burn $LYNO.
AI Agent Access & Priority
- Access to create arbitrage bots with different token pairs.
- Customization for the depth and liquidity of arbitrage strategies.
Liquidity Mining Incentives
- Provide liquidity to $LYNO pairs across supported chains.
- Earn additional $LYNO rewards (from the staking reward pool).
- Boosted rewards for tier-based liquidity provision.
Frequently Asked Questions
LYNO is a decentralized, AI-powered protocol designed to identify and execute cross-chain arbitrage opportunities across EVM-compatible blockchains. It enables users to benefit from market inefficiencies with minimal effort and maximum efficiency.
LYNO leverages machine learning and predictive models to scan thousands of tokens and liquidity pools in real-time. Its AI layer identifies arbitrage opportunities, calculates execution risks, and optimizes trade routing—completely autonomously.
Anyone with a Web3 wallet can participate. Whether you're a DeFi enthusiast, passive investor, or technical validator—LYNO provides accessible tools to engage with cross-chain arbitrage at any scale.
LYNO supports major EVM-compatible blockchains, including Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and more via integrated cross-chain bridges.
Unlike centralized or manual systems, LYNO is Autonomous, Cross-Chain Native, AI-Driven and Efficient. It democratizes access to arbitrage opportunities that were previously only available to institutions or technical experts.

argos_summary: LYNO AI is experiencing strong investor interest during its presale, having sold over 265,000 tokens at a price of $0.050 each, with an imminent price increase to $0.055. The presale includes a giveaway for early buyers, enhancing its appeal, and is audited by Cyberscope, ensuring transparency. Investors are encouraged to act quickly to take advantage of the current pricing and promotional offers before the presale concludes.
